Text:
Why is the scan so small of a sudden? It's usally fills most of my screen. 

Either way, thanks for the up, Mr. D.
MuckyMucks - I didnt notice anything with the size. ? But I have nothing to do with the scans I just upload and seed.

The pages are about 1073px wide, which is fine by me.

Page 4 is broken: it has an incorrect file extension. If you use CDisplay to read this CBR, page 4 won't appear. 

To fix it, downloaders will need to open the CBR archive in WinRAR (or some similar program) and change page 4's file extension to JPG.
Hey Man, Do you think you could upload a copy of Avatar the last airbender The Promise Part 2? It would be much appreciated as the other copies on the internet are horrible quality.
Page 4 and the rest of the comic opened fine for me in ComicRack, maybe you should re-download
